definition: to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: In each gene, the 3A gene mutation rates are the tallest.
sentences.chinese: 在各基因中，3A基因突变率最高。

sentences.english: The more the gene mutation , the higher the malignant degree of astrocytomas.
sentences.chinese: 不同位点基因突变越多，星形细胞瘤恶性度越高。

sentences.english: So researchers introduced genetic changes into the mouse FOXP2.
sentences.chinese: 因此，研究者对老鼠引入了基因突变FOXP2。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse TBX5 mutation in Chinese patients with Holt Oram syndrome(HOS).
sentences.chinese: 目的检测中国心手综合征患者TBX5基因突变。

sentences.english: The variegation of petals originates chiefly from gene mutation and viral infection.
sentences.chinese: 花瓣彩斑主要由基因突变或病毒入侵而形成。

sentences.english: The results showed that the hearts of the mutated mice skipped beats intermittently.
sentences.chinese: 结果显示，基因突变小鼠的心脏会间歇性的漏掉一拍。

sentences.english: Gene mutation analysis was performed for patients with BH4 deficiency and their parents.
sentences.chinese: 对BH4缺乏症者及父母进行基因突变检测。

sentences.english: The blue coloring happens when lobsters produce too much protein because of a genetic mutation.
sentences.chinese: 当龙虾基因突变产生过多的蛋白质，就会呈现蓝色。

sentences.english: At the technical level, biologists argue that gene-splitting will lead to major improvements in crop yields.
sentences.chinese: 在技术层面上，生物学家认为，基因突变将在。

sentences.english: R46 May cause heritable genetic damage.
sentences.chinese: 可引起可遗传的基因突变。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship between the mutation of growth hormone-related genes and primary amenorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨生长激素相关基因突变与原发闭经的关系。

sentences.english: This review is about the gene mutation and phenotype of CYP3A4.
sentences.chinese: 本文对CYP3A4基因突变及其表型特征加以总结。

sentences.english: Conclusion The mutation of SOD1 gene may be responsible for the disease of this family.
sentences.chinese: 结论SOD1基因突变可能是引起该家系发病的原因。

sentences.english: The lobster is bright blue, the result of an extremely rare genetic mutation.
sentences.chinese: 这只龙虾呈宝蓝色，是相当罕见的基因突变结果。

sentences.english: New mutations can occasionally lead to severe diseases like cancer.
sentences.chinese: 基因突变偶尔也会导致癌症等严重的疾病。

sentences.english: Gaucher (pronounced "go-SHAY") disease is an inherited illness caused by a gene mutation.
sentences.chinese: 戈谢病是一种由基因突变引起的疾病。

definition: allele (one of two paired gene in diploid organism)
heredity/to inherit (a trait)/to pass on (to one's offspring)
